feed.title: Habitica Releases

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.32.1 Chores
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Client

  • Chore: Update images CSS for New Year's hat notification (@weblate)

Scripts

  • Feature: Overhauled New Year's award ladder (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.32.2 Winter Wonderland hotfix
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Don't push Winter Wonderland dates forward one year if we're already in January (@phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Scripts

  • Fix: Replace sunset update function in bulk emailing script (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.32.3 Subscription Benefits Clarification
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Revise subscription benefits text on subs page / when gifting, for better clarity (@SabreCat)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.32.4 Backgrounds Availability Fix
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Correct availability for newly released backgrounds in first month of year (@phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Scripts

  • Fix: updateOne instead of update in script for granting all gear items to a test account (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.32.5 Wiki Link Revisions
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate)

Client

  • Fix: Add bottom margin to div with toggle button in Equipment view (@SabreCat)
